title: Art Deco-style "Australia" movie poster logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150203064238im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aus_4684.jpg)

Anyone know what font this is?
author: bootsboy

comments.content: As this poster tries to mimick vintage movie posters, I'd say this movie logo most probably is custom drawn.
Have a look at the work of Douglas Annand. He did some pretty amazing work around the time that this poster is aping.
The actors' and director's names indeed, but I thought Matt was specifically asking for the movie logo.
I am asking for the logo not the names, thank you.

I think Yves is correct that AUSTRALIA is custom drawn. The closest I can suggest is Red Rooster's [Radiant Bold Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150203064238/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/radiant/), which includes a symmetrical U as an alternate character. A tweak to the A and added quarter circle serifs would get you pretty close.

- Mike Yanega
